sentence.text: Here, we have described a homozygous missense variant (c.602CAAAAT, p.S201F) in epithelial cell-cell adhesion, identified by whole-exome sequencing, in a family of 4 with cardiac arrhythmia and limb-girdle muscular dystrophy (LGMD).

Our study therefore identifies epithelial cell-cell adhesion as a disease gene causing a very rare autosomal recessive cardiac arrhythmia and LGMD, expanding the genetic causes of this heterogeneous group of inherited rare diseases
